name: Nadav Ivgi
description: Working on open-source bitcoin stuff since '13, volunteer at the [@BitcoinEmbassy](https://twitter.com/bitcoinembassy) and wannabe cypherpunk. Some of my work includes [Bitcoin Wallet Tracker](https://github.com/shesek/bwt), [Minsc](https://min.sc), [Spark Lightning Wallet](https://github.com/shesek/spark-wallet), [Lightning Charge](https://github.com/ElementsProject/lightning-charge) (+[a bunch of lapps](https://coinjournal.net/news/blockstream-lightning-charge-lapps/)) and [Esplora](https://github.com/blockstream/esplora).
